item.title: Status Update – March 4, 2020
item.description: I took kids to the bus stop and came back home. Lesa and I both went to talk to Dwyane’s Speech Therapist Darren Swango at Springville Elementary. Got to hear the kids announcements. Dwyane is doing really good, intermittent trouble with sh sounds. Afterward we talked about Dillan’s speech, he can pronounce sounds okay but tends to go to fast, run words together, and kind of mumbles his words making him difficult to understand – don’t we know it!
